glsa.title: Evince: Command injection
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in Evince which may allow for arbitrary command execution.

background.p: Evince is a document viewer for multiple document formats, including PostScript.

description.p: A vulnerability was discovered in Evinceâ€™s handling of filenames while printing PDF files.

impact.p: A remote attacker, by enticing the user to process a specially crafted file, could execute arbitrary commands.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Evince users should upgrade to the latest version:
